algorithm_technique: Simulate robot movement, track position and direction; check for return to origin or change in direction.
problem_summary_simple: Determine if a robot, following instructions repeatedly, stays within a bounded circle.
problem_summary_technical: Simulate robot movement, checking if it returns to origin or changes direction after one cycle of instructions.
key_insights: The robot is bounded if, after one full cycle of instructions, it either returns to the origin (0,0) or ends up facing a different direction.
If the robot returns to the origin, it will repeat the same path and stay bounded.
If the robot does not return to the origin but changes its direction, it might eventually return to the origin after subsequent cycles due to the change in orientation.
